contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Volleyball Olympic tourney | city = Los Angeles | year = 1984 | logo = Olympic rings.svg | size = 140px | olympics = 1984 Summer Olympics | host = United States | dates = July 29 – August 11 | man_teams = 10 | man_gold = USA | man_silver = BRA | man_bronze = ITA | women_teams = 8 | women_gold = CHN | women_silver = USA | women_bronze = JPN | website = }} This page presents the results of male and female [[volleyball]] during the [[1984 Summer Olympics|Olympic Games of Los Angeles]] in the summer of [[1984 in sports|1984]]. The competition was held in the [[Long Beach Arena]], which had a capacity of 12,033. ==Medal table== {| {{RankedMedalTable}} |- |1||align=left|{{flagIOC|USA|1984 Summer}}||1||1||0||2 |- |2||align=left|{{flagIOC|CHN|1984 Summer}}||1||0||0||1 |- |3||align=left|{{flagIOC|BRA|1984 Summer}}||0||1||0||1 |- |rowspan=2|4||align=left|{{flagIOC|ITA|1984 Summer}}||0||0||1||1 |- |align=left|{{flagIOC|JPN|1984 Summer}}||0||0||1||1 |} ==Medal summary== {| {{MedalistTable|type=Event}} |- |Men's volleyball<br>{{DetailsLink|volleyball at the 1984 Summer Olympics – Men's {{flagIOCteam|JPN|1984 Summer}} <hr>[[Yumi Egami]]<br>[[Norie Hiro]]<br>[[Miyoko Hirose]]<br>[[Kyoko Ishida]]<br>[[Yoko Kagabu]]<br>[[Yuko Mitsuya]]<br>[[Keiko Miyajima]]<br>[[Kimie Morita]]<br>[[Kumi Nakada]]<br>[[Emiko Odaka]]<br>[[Sachiko Otani]]<br>[[Kayoko Sugiyama]] |} == Highlights == * USA won the men's title. Brazil took second. It was [[Karch Kiraly]]'s first Olympic Gold medal. * China won women's title. USA took second. * '''Chinese Women Volleyball National Teams''' finished three-peats (Winners in World Cup 1981, World Volleyball Championships 1982 and Los Angeles Olympic Games 1984). ==See also== * [[Volleyball at the Friendship Games]] {{Olympic Games Volleyball}} {{EventsAt1984SummerOlympics}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Volleyball At The 1984 Summer Olympics}} [[Category:Volleyball at the Summer Olympics|1984]] [[Category:1984 in volleyball|O]] [[Category:1984 Summer Olympics events]] [[Category:American volleyball competitions]] [[Category:Volleyball at the 1984 Summer Olympics| ]]
